title: Spell check the FAQ
description: Spelole check the FAQ page in the Wiki. There are multiple errors, especially in the section on Why don't international characters work. I tried to edit it myself, but the page is locked.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
Wiki pages are editable by anyone who creates a (free) account.

Click the "Login" link at the top right of any page, fill in your info and click "Create Profile"
